title: Under Warranty - Send it to google or reseller?
content:
Hi,

I bought a Pixel 3 in July this year and it in died 2days ago while it was working fine before. I have tried different chargers and waited for some time (one being the original). How do I proceed with the warranty?

I bought it online while living in Spain a few months back online via the Phone House and the seller by the name of Electropolis that seems to be based in Spain, When I asked them about warranty I got two different answers, one said that I should make a case via them and the other one said that I should contact google directly since it's only a few months, which is correct?

Im currently based in Sweden and I'm wondering which is the best and easiest way for me to proceed with a warranty claim?

Thanks in advance.

-Christian
